name: EccentricExilesServer
description:
Base Server Mod for all Eccentric Exiles Mods.

This mod adds a Feat that groups all other Eccentric Exiles Feats. It also adds server Flags for Eccentric Exiles Clans.

Default Server Flags, inculding a Map Marker Flag are available to all players. Clan/Player based flags are given by admins.

(If you are a clan leader on the server you can request a banner be added for your clan)
(Clan Symbols are also needed if you want a land claim marker)

Compatiblity: Uses ID's 951357### (all Eccentric Exiles Mods use this and following ids)

[h1] Modding and Server Discord [/h1]
I have a discord server for both my mods, and my servers. Bug reports can be sent to me on discord too. Joining discord does not auto give you access to the server, but I may let you access depending on who you are.

[url=https://discord.gg/eHKNyBGRKb] Discord Invite Link [/url]

[h1]Direct Download[/h1]
All my mods are available for direct download from my discord server. Only the most recent update will be saved.
changeNote:
added wheel of pain markers for clans to use
